solution_line_template: Happy has to take {increase_percentage} * {current_intake} = <<{increase_percentage}*{current_intake}={additional_cups}>>{additional_cups} more cups of water than she takes currently to reach the recommended water intake levels by her doctor.
In total, she is supposed to drink {additional_cups}+{current_intake} = <<{additional_cups}+{current_intake}={recommended_cups}>>{recommended_cups} cups of water every week.
